caller_intent: Steve from Alliance Motor Credit wants to confirm that a mutual customer is listed as a lienholder and has full coverage on their insurance policy.
resolution_steps: Agent acknowledges the request and offers to connect Steve with an agent who can assist with verifying lienholder status and coverage details.
knowledge_required: Understanding of lienholder status in insurance policies
Knowledge of full coverage requirements for auto insurance
summary: Steve from Alliance Motor Credit contacted Alliance Insurance to verify a mutual customer's lienholder status and full coverage. The agent offered to transfer the call to a specialist for further assistance, indicating the need for a follow-up.
